author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 15, 2015
text: Thursday on the NewsHour, President Obama announces he will leave additional troops in Afghanistan until 2017. Also: A fresh lead emerges in the Lockerbie bombing case, a pilot program to help stop recidivism in U.S. prisons, why you might not need as much sleep as you think, how social entrepreneurs can improve the lives of others and looking into the future of education.
